Welcome…
Yoga is thought to have originated in India 5,000 years ago and offers us a holistic approach to body, mind and spirit.

Balanced hatha yoga practice offers stretch and flex for the body, helps us to develop breath awareness and can also help us to catch a glimpse of “inner peace” through relaxation and meditation.
Earth Yoga
The Natural Way to Body Balance...
